Texts.Chs:
水产养殖是未来种植作物的趋势。它是鲛人族的传统农业栽培技术改良而成，可以比普通栽培方法加快200%。

另外，它对于香蕉必不可少的猿族是相当有利的。
Texts.Eng:
Aquaculture seems to be the wave of the future. By modifying traditional Hylotl agricultural practices, we have been able to increase nutrient paste output by approximately 200%.

Needless to say, this has interesting ramifications for Apex society as a whole.

Texts.Chs:
鱼、珊瑚、作物都被封闭于同一个生态系统里，这样可以更好地保护自然环境。

我相信在两年时间内，这种技术绝对会广泛地应用开来。
Texts.Eng:
Fish, corals and vegetation work together to produce a superb closed ecosystem with minimal waste and outside inputs. Space is saved, even when one considers standard hydroponic setups.

We are confident that in two years' time, ration books will be a thing of the past, breaking the greatest hold the resistance has on the populace.

Texts.Chs: 不过遗憾的是，我们还没能发明出一种可以安全浸入咸水中的香蕉品种，不过三角洲团队似乎已经取得了一些进展。在此期间，我建议增加‘我不敢相信这不是香蕉！’的发放来应对如今公民对于香蕉的渴望。
Texts.Eng: Our only regret is that we have yet to produce a banana variant that will tolerate submersion in brine, but Delta Team appears to be onto some promising results. In the meantime, we suggest increasing allotments of 'I can't believe it's not banana!' banana flavouring to mollify citizens.
